# Summary

Highly motivated statistics student with experience in software design. Interested in various facets of Open Technologies. Puts care into making the analyses easily reproducible. I am at my best when collaborating with others.

# Projects


\cvevent{May. 2023}{Project Lead}{\href{https://aman9das.github.io/blog/2023-sem2-midsem-stat-project/}{Statistics Project}}{{Coordinate the project to analyse Foreign Tourist Visits to India},{Implemented the analysis paper using Quarto.}}
\cvevent{Dec. 2022}{Analysis and Design Lead}{\href{https://aman9das.github.io/blog/2022-sem1-endsem-stat-project/PPT_Reveal.html}{Statistics Project}}{{Statistical Analysis of GDP per capita, Sanitation and Life Expectancy across Nations.},{Implemented the presentation design in Quarto.}}
\cvevent{Sep. 2021}{UI Design}{\href{https://f-droid.org/en/packages/de.monocles.chat/}{Monocles Chat}}{{Redesigned the chat screen.},{Created a new color theme.}}
\cvevent{May 2022 - Present}{Package Deployment}{\href{https://flathub.org/}{Flathub}}{{Packaged Remnants of the Precursors (ROTP), Wick Editor, Dino and Gargoyle.},{Maintain Ghostwriter, ROTP and Wick Editor for Flathub.}}
\cvevent{Oct. 2021}{App Developer}{\href{https://arcticons.onnno.nl}{Arcticons}}{{Re-implemented the Android app on Candybar framework and created Widgets.},{Developed the UI and added a number of Icons.}}
